DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Brivanib is an effective treatment for liver cancer in patients who have failed or could not take Sorafenib
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Brivanib and Best Supportive Care to Placebo for Treatment of Liver Cancer for Those Subjects Who Have Failed Sorafenib Treatment
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com.
